verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <S%H1961><s%> become בַּשָּׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> And it came to pass the same year הַהִ֗יא <S%H1931><s%> the same בְּרֵאשִׁית֙ <S%H7225><s%> in the beginning מַמְלֶ֙כֶת֙ <S%H4467><s%> of the reign צִדְקִיָּ֣ה <S%H6667><s%> of Zedekiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah [בִּשְׁנַת כ] (בַּשָּׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> year ק) הָֽרְבִעִ֔ית <S%H7243><s%> in the fourth בַּחֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַחֲמִישִׁ֑י <S%H2549><s%> [and] in the fifth אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> spake אֵלַ֡י <S%H413><s%> about חֲנַנְיָה֩ <S%H2608><s%> [that] Hananiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עַזּ֨וּר <S%H5809><s%> of Azur הַנָּבִ֜יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who מִגִּבְעוֹן֙ <S%H1391><s%> which [was] of Gibeon בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> unto me in the house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לְעֵינֵ֧י <S%H5869><s%> in the presence הַכֹּהֲנִ֛ים <S%H3548><s%> of the priests וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> and of all the people לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> Thus speaketh יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֛וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying שָׁבַ֞רְתִּי <S%H7665><s%> I have broken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֹ֖ל <S%H5923><s%> the yoke מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king בָּבֶֽל׃ <S%H894><s%> of Babylon

בְּע֣וֹד ׀ <S%H5750><s%> Within שְׁנָתַ֣יִם <S%H8141><s%> years יָמִ֗ים <S%H3117><s%> Within two full אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> I am מֵשִׁיב֙ <S%H7725><s%> will I bring again אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַמָּק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> into this place הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> to this אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all כְּלֵ֖י <S%H3627><s%> all the vessels בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD'S אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which לָקַ֜ח <S%H3947><s%> took away נְבוּכַדנֶאצַּ֤ר <S%H5019><s%> that Nebuchadnezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king בָּבֶל֙ <S%H894><s%> of Babylon מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַמָּק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> from this place הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this וַיְבִיאֵ֖ם <S%H935><s%> and carried בָּבֶֽל׃ <S%H894><s%> them to Babylon

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְכָנְיָ֣ה <S%H3204><s%> Jeconiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְהוֹיָקִ֣ים <S%H3079><s%> of Jehoiakim מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יְ֠הוּדָה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all גָּל֨וּת <S%H1546><s%> with all the captives יְהוּדָ֜ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah הַבָּאִ֣ים <S%H935><s%> that went בָּבֶ֗לָה <S%H894><s%> into Babylon אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am מֵשִׁ֛יב <S%H7725><s%> And I will bring again אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַמָּק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> to this place הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> to this נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אֶשְׁבֹּ֔ר <S%H7665><s%> for I will break אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֹ֖ל <S%H5923><s%> the yoke מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king בָּבֶֽל׃ <S%H894><s%> of Babylon

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> said יִרְמְיָ֣ה <S%H3414><s%> Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֔יא <S%H5030><s%> Then the prophet אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about חֲנַנְיָ֖ה <S%H2608><s%> Hananiah הַנָּבִ֑יא <S%H5030><s%> unto the prophet לְעֵינֵ֤י <S%H5869><s%> in the presence הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> of the priests וּלְעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> and in the presence כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> of all the people הָעֹמְדִ֖ים <S%H5975><s%> that stood בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> said יִרְמְיָ֣ה <S%H3414><s%> Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֔יא <S%H5030><s%> Even the prophet אָמֵ֕ן <S%H543><s%> Amen כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> so יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> do יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> God יָקֵ֤ם <S%H6965><s%> perform יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבָרֶ֔יךָ <S%H1697><s%> thy words אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which נִבֵּ֗אתָ <S%H5012><s%> which thou hast prophesied לְהָשִׁ֞יב <S%H7725><s%> to bring again כְּלֵ֤י <S%H3627><s%> the vessels בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> house יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַגּוֹלָ֔ה <S%H1473><s%> and all that is carried away captive מִבָּבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> from Babylon אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַמָּק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> into this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> also שְׁמַֽע־ <S%H8085><s%> listen

נָא֙ <S%H4994><s%> now הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> thou now this word הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I דֹּבֵ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> that I speak בְּאָזְנֶ֑יךָ <S%H241><s%> in thine ears וּבְאָזְנֵ֖י <S%H241><s%> and in the ears כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> of all the people

הַנְּבִיאִ֗ים <S%H5030><s%> The prophets אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who הָי֧וּ <S%H1961><s%> become לְפָנַ֛י <S%H6440><s%> that have been before וּלְפָנֶ֖יךָ <S%H6440><s%> me and before מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָֽעוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> thee of old וַיִּנָּ֨בְא֜וּ <S%H5012><s%> prophesied אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against אֲרָצ֤וֹת <S%H776><s%> countries רַבּוֹת֙ <S%H7227><s%> both against many וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and against מַמְלָכ֣וֹת <S%H4467><s%> kingdoms גְּדֹל֔וֹת <S%H1419><s%> and against great לְמִלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> of war וּלְרָעָ֥ה <S%H7451><s%> and of evil וּלְדָֽבֶר׃ <S%H1698><s%> and of pestilence

הַנָּבִ֕יא <S%H5030><s%> The prophet אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who יִנָּבֵ֖א <S%H5012><s%> which prophesieth לְשָׁל֑וֹם <S%H7965><s%> of peace בְּבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> shall come to pass דְּבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> when the word הַנָּבִ֗יא <S%H5030><s%> of the prophet יִוָּדַע֙ <S%H3045><s%> be known הַנָּבִ֔יא <S%H5030><s%> shall the prophet אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom שְׁלָח֥וֹ <S%H7971><s%> sent יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD בֶּאֱמֶֽת׃ <S%H571><s%> hath truly

וַיִּקַּ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> took חֲנַנְיָ֤ה <S%H2608><s%> Then Hananiah הַנָּבִיא֙ <S%H5030><s%> the prophet אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמּוֹטָ֔ה <S%H4133><s%> the yoke מֵעַ֕ל <S%H5921><s%> from צַוַּ֖אר <S%H6677><s%> neck יִרְמְיָ֣ה <S%H3414><s%> Jeremiah's הַנָּבִ֑יא <S%H5030><s%> from off the prophet וַֽיִּשְׁבְּרֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H7665><s%> and brake

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake חֲנַנְיָה֩ <S%H2608><s%> And Hananiah לְעֵינֵ֨י <S%H5869><s%> in the presence כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָעָ֜ם <S%H5971><s%> of all the people לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saying כֹּה֮ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָה֒ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כָּ֣כָה <S%H3602><s%> Even אֶשְׁבֹּ֞ר <S%H7665><s%> Even so will I break אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֹ֣ל ׀ <S%H5923><s%> the yoke נְבֻֽכַדְנֶאצַּ֣ר <S%H5019><s%> of Nebuchadnezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king בָּבֶ֗ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon בְּעוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> within שְׁנָתַ֣יִם <S%H8141><s%> years יָמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> within the space of two full מֵעַ֕ל <S%H5921><s%> from צַוַּ֖אר <S%H6677><s%> from the neck כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> of all nations וַיֵּ֛לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went יִרְמְיָ֥ה <S%H3414><s%> Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> And the prophet לְדַרְכּֽוֹ׃ <S%H1870><s%> his way פ

וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Then the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִרְמְיָ֑ה <S%H3414><s%> came unto Jeremiah אַ֠חֲרֵי <S%H310><s%> [the prophet] after שְׁב֞וֹר <S%H7665><s%> had broken חֲנַנְיָ֤ה <S%H2608><s%> that Hananiah הַנָּבִיא֙ <S%H5030><s%> the prophet אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמּוֹטָ֔ה <S%H4133><s%> the yoke מֵעַ֗ל <S%H5921><s%> off צַוַּ֛אר <S%H6677><s%> from off the neck יִרְמְיָ֥ה <S%H3414><s%> Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> of the prophet לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

הָלוֹךְ֩ <S%H1980><s%> Go וְאָמַרְתָּ֨ <S%H559><s%> and tell אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to חֲנַנְיָ֜ה <S%H2608><s%> Hananiah לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saying כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD מוֹטֹ֥ת <S%H4133><s%> the yokes עֵ֖ץ <S%H6086><s%> of wood שָׁבָ֑רְתָּ <S%H7665><s%> Thou hast broken וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <S%H6213><s%> but thou shalt make תַחְתֵּיהֶ֖ן <S%H8478><s%> instead מֹט֥וֹת <S%H4133><s%> for them yokes בַּרְזֶֽל׃ <S%H1270><s%> of iron

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For כֹֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַר֩ <S%H559><s%> For thus saith יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֜וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עֹ֣ל <S%H5923><s%> a yoke בַּרְזֶ֡ל <S%H1270><s%> of iron נָתַ֜תִּי <S%H5414><s%> I have put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on צַוַּ֣אר ׀ <S%H6677><s%> upon the neck כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הַגּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> of all these nations הָאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these לַעֲבֹ֛ד <S%H5647><s%> that they may serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נְבֻכַדְנֶאצַּ֥ר <S%H5019><s%> Nebuchadnezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king בָּבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon וַעֲבָדֻ֑הוּ <S%H5647><s%> and they shall serve וְגַ֛ם <S%H1571><s%> have also אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חַיַּ֥ת <S%H2416><s%> him the beasts הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field נָתַ֥תִּי <S%H5414><s%> him and I have given לֽוֹ׃

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said יִרְמְיָ֧ה <S%H3414><s%> Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֛יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to חֲנַנְיָ֥ה <S%H2608><s%> unto Hananiah הַנָּבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet שְׁמַֽע־ <S%H8085><s%> Hear נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> now חֲנַנְיָ֑ה <S%H2608><s%> now Hananiah לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> has not שְׁלָחֲךָ֣ <S%H7971><s%> hath not sent יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD וְאַתָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> you הִבְטַ֛חְתָּ <S%H982><s%> to trust אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> thee but thou makest this people הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in שָֽׁקֶר׃ <S%H8267><s%> in a lie

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הִנְנִי֙ <S%H2005><s%> I am about מְשַֽׁלֵּֽחֲךָ֔ <S%H7971><s%> Behold I will cast מֵעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> from פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> thee from off the face הָאֲדָמָ֑ה <S%H127><s%> of the earth הַשָּׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> this year אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you מֵ֔ת <S%H4191><s%> thou shalt die כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because סָרָ֥ה <S%H5627><s%> rebellion דִבַּ֖רְתָּ <S%H1696><s%> because thou hast taught אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD

וַיָּ֛מָת <S%H4191><s%> died חֲנַנְיָ֥ה <S%H2608><s%> So Hananiah הַנָּבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet בַּשָּׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> the same year הַהִ֑יא <S%H1931><s%> the same בַּחֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשְּׁבִיעִֽי׃ <S%H7637><s%> in the seventh פ
